title: Short Stories Are an Underused Storytelling Device in Games | Slightly Something Else
description:
This week on Slightly Something Else the old format returns and Yahtzee and Marty are discussing how short stories are underused in video games.

title: Toilet Chronicles | Hidden Gems with KC and Jesse
description:
Each week KC and Jesse check out a overlooked game on Steam and decide whether or not it's a "Hidden Gem". This week they're checking out Toilet Chronicles.

description:
